sections.heading: advertisement to telephone facsimile machine; prohibited
sections.text: A person shall not use a telephone facsimile machine, computer, or other device to send an unsolicited advertisement to a telephone facsimile machine.SourceLaws 1993, LB 305, ยง 9;R.S.1943, (1999), ยง 86-1209;Laws 2002, LB 1105, ยง 107.
